Say goodbye to waxy buildup, funky smells, and itchy, irritated ears—without stressing out your cat.


MeowMint™ Soothing Ear Wipes are the gentle, non-toxic way to keep your cat’s ears clean, fresh, and healthy. Vet-approved and made with natural ingredients like aloe vera, witch hazel, and chamomile, each pre-moistened wipe helps remove dirt, control odor, and calm sensitive skin.

 

Formulated for even the most fussy felines, our ear wipes are fragrance-free, alcohol-free, and pH-balanced for regular use. No dripping, no mess—just swipe and toss.

 

Perfect for:

  • Soothing itchy, irritated ears
  • Wax & dirt removal
  • Reducing ear odor
  • Supporting long-term ear health

How to use

How to use

Slide your finger into the wipe.

Gently wipe inside your cat’s ear. Not too deep!

Use a fresh wipe per ear! Toss when done.
